quest.name: The Organ of Sight
objectives: Obtain flying shark livers from flying sharks.
Deliver the flying shark livers to Shihoji.

dialogue.name: SHIHOJI
dialogue.text: MadamSir? MadamSir! Might you bring me three flying shark livers? You can find them on the northern tip of this island.

dialogue.name: SHIHOJI
dialogue.text: I would go myself, but alas, I have grown too weak in my old age to hunt anything so fierce. That said, you shall, of course, be rewarded for your help.

dialogue.name: SHIHOJI
dialogue.text: Please bring me the livers of three flying sharks. You should be able to find them to the north of here.

dialogue.name: SHIHOJI
dialogue.text: Have you brought me my livers?

dialogue.name: SHIHOJI
dialogue.text: Excellent! Thank you, madamsir. Now I shall finally be able to make myself some liver oil!

dialogue.name: SHIHOJI
dialogue.text: It will help me to keep my eyes sharp. They are my greatest asset, after all. With my hawk-like vision, I can see everythingâ”€including the sobbing faces of those spineless bakufu soldiers at the Ruby Price. Hahaha!

dialogue.name: SHIHOJI
dialogue.text: While I can no longer fight, for the next twenty years I intend to earn my keep at the Confederacy as a lookout!
